data.title: Croatia population 2024
data.meta_description:
Year wise population of Croatia from 1950 to 2100 by United Nations. Data tables and
charts.
data.text:
The current population of Croatia is 3,870,706 as of August 30, 2024, based on interpolation of the latest United Nations data. The population of Croatia is projected at 3,986,627, or 3.99 million, as of July 1, 2024. The total population in Croatia is projected at 4,008,617, or 4.01 million people for the year 2023.

Croatia ranks 130th in the world by population on the 237 countries and territories list. Croatia is ranked 27th among 50 countries and territories in Europe.
